snippet: Cathy Lang Ho, who is putting on an exhibition about citizen-initiated use of public space, is the motivating force behind giving soccer fans the chance to watch games in that outdoor setting.
abstract: Cathy Lang Ho, who is putting on an exhibition about citizen-initiated use of public space, is the motivating force behind giving soccer fans the chance to watch games in that outdoor setting.

headline.main: World Cup Comes to Governors Island, via the Big Screen
